9.25.18  2:46 am   what is the most practical way to create a website like this that allows people to access content without any bullshit? i guess i could google a little harder, but the only ways i've been able to make a site is through google, wix, and this other one called web.com, and i'm wondering if you knew a way to bypass those sites and create the site with my own code?

Â Â Â Â Â start on your hard drive, just to get the idea. take a text file, save it as plain text (not rich text) put a bunch of html in it, then save it as .html. then drop that into your favorite web browser and pow you have a website, except it's only on your computer. then you'll have to get hosting, which you have to pay yearly for. and then get ready to see targetted ads from hosting companies for the rest of your life, even long after you bought it. you'll also see wix ads telling you 'you need a website why not do it yourself' even for centuries after you already made your own website yourself

9.25.18  1:12 am   Any prediction on when this site will by up to date, like the notes and reality sections?

Â Â Â Â Â it's important that those sections are not up to date. it's kind of like how reality shows are not usually filmed live. this gives the editors a chance to tell the stories in a much more compelling way

9.25.18  12:59 am   learn anything new and fun recently?

Â Â Â Â Â yes

9.25.18  12:57 am   Two months ago I upgraded from a flip phone to a smart phone, irreversibly, and it has been a huge distraction for me in terms of media consumption. How do I discipline myself out of this and back to music production? I'm ashamed of myself.

Â Â Â Â Â set some boundaries. first, do you need the phone for anything during music production? if not, then put it in a drawer. if you do actually need certain things from it during music production, then you will have to get used to setting some hard rules about never opening certain apps. the trick to getting used to this is the morning. if you can stay completely out of those apps when you first wake up, it will be much much much easier to avoid them for the rest of the work day, at least until the work day is done

9.25.18  12:55 am   I don't get why 9.22.18  9:59 pm was a question. How do you record a piece before it even exists?

Â Â Â Â Â ah that's exactly what makes that joke tick
